verses.verse: מִכְתָּ֥ם <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam Michtam לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David שָֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Re-ni Preserve אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, me O God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חָסִ֥יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti for in thee do I put my trust בָֽךְ׃ Vach.

אָמַ֣רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mart [O my soul] thou hast said לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Thou [art] my Lord אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י <S%H2896><s%> toa-Ti, my goodness בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- have no עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha. besides

לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים <S%H6918><s%> Lik-do-shim [But] to the saints אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz [are] in the earth הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah; that וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י <S%H117><s%> ve-'ad-di-Rei, and [to] the excellent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- is all חֶפְצִי־ <S%H2656><s%> chef-tzi- in whom [is] all my delight בָֽם׃ Vam.

יִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> yir-Bu shall be multiplied עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ <S%H6094><s%> atz-tze-vo-Tam Their sorrows אַחֵ֪ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher [after] another מָ֫הָ֥רוּ <S%H4116><s%> ma-Ha-ru [that] hasten בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- nor אַסִּ֣יךְ <S%H5258><s%> 'as-Sich will I not offer נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם <S%H5262><s%> nis-kei-Hem [god] their drink offerings מִדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> mid-Dam; of blood וּֽבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> u-val- Nor אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'e-toSh- שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> mo-Tam, their names עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tai. into my lips

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מְנָת־ <S%H4490><s%> me-not- [is] the portion חֶלְקִ֥י <S%H2506><s%> chel-Ki of mine inheritance וְכוֹסִ֑י <S%H3563><s%> ve-cho-Si; and of my cup אַ֝תָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, You תּוֹמִ֥יךְ <S%H8551><s%> to-Mich thou maintainest גּוֹרָלִֽי׃ <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Li. my lot

חֲבָלִ֣ים <S%H2256><s%> cha-va-Lim The lines נָֽפְלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-lu- are fallen לִ֭י li בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים <S%H5273><s%> ban-ne-'i-Mim; unto me in pleasant אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- Indeed נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat, heritage שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה <S%H8231><s%> sha-fe-Rah [places] yea I have a goodly עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and

אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <S%H1288><s%> 'a-va-Rech, I will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יְעָצָ֑נִי <S%H3289><s%> ye-'a-Tza-ni; who hath given me counsel אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- Indeed לֵ֝יל֗וֹת <S%H3915><s%> lei-Lot, me in the night seasons יִסְּר֥וּנִי <S%H3256><s%> yis-se-Ru-ni also instruct כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H3629><s%> chil-yo-Tai. my reins

שִׁוִּ֬יתִי <S%H7737><s%> shiv-Vi-ti I have set יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Di before תָמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid; always כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י <S%H3225><s%> mi-mi-Ni, before me because [he is] at my right hand בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> em-Mot. I shall not be moved

לָכֵ֤ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore שָׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> sa-Mach is glad לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> Lib-bi Therefore my heart וַיָּ֣גֶל <S%H1523><s%> vai-Ya-gel rejoiceth כְּבוֹדִ֑י <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Di; and my glory אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ri, my flesh יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon also shall rest לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach. in hope

כִּ֤י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor תַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> ta-'a-Zo For thou wilt not leave נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul לִשְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7585><s%> lish-'ol; in hell לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor תִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten neither wilt thou suffer חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-de-cha, thine Holy One לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see שָֽׁחַת׃ <S%H7845><s%> Sha-chat corruption

תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ <S%H3045><s%> to-di-'e-Ni Thou wilt shew אֹ֤רַח <S%H734><s%> 'O-rach me the path חַ֫יִּ֥ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim of life שֹׂ֣בַע <S%H7648><s%> Soa' [is] fulness שְׂ֭מָחוֹת <S%H8057><s%> ma-chot of joy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha; in thy presence נְעִמ֖וֹת <S%H5273><s%> ne-'i-Mot [there are] pleasures בִּימִינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> bi-mi-ne-Cha at thy right hand נֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> Ne-tzach. for evermore
